document_data.mainbody:
erthisathurgiesh Pandjed was the dragonborn patriarch of Clan Verthisathurgiesh in the late years of the 15th century DR, until his death in 1486 DR. He was a direct descendant of Khorsaya.
According to Anala, Dumuzi, and Tarhun, Pandjed was a look-alike of his son, Mehen.
Pandjed was an aggressive individual, prone to fits of rage.
Pandjed could breathe lightning.
Pandjed was the elder brother of Anala, and the father of Mehen.
Around 1450 DR, Pandjed exiled his scion, Mehen, because he had a gay relationship with his clanmate, Verthisathurgiesh Arjhani, and didnt want to marry Kepeshkmolik Uadjit.
The situation worsened when Pandjed began to exile from the clan nearly anyone who annoyed him, greatly damaging his clans reputation in Thymari society.
In 1486 DR, Pandjed died of a heart attack.
